apps.name: Addme
apps.title: All your social in one
apps.description: Addme is the easiest way to share all your social profiles with just one simple link. Get follows across your favorite social networks and engage with all your followers!

apps.name: GoChallenge.me
apps.title: Social platform that is incentivizing people to achieve their goals
apps.description: GoChallenge.me is a social platform that is incentivizing people to achieve their goals through competition and accountability.

apps.name: Kindred
apps.title: Social driven app where interaction between users is rewarded with Kin
apps.description: Kindred is a social driven app where interaction between users is rewarded with Kin. It’s core mechanic is enabling you to find and meet other people in real life in your local area.

apps.name: Kinny
apps.title: Kinny
apps.description: Send and receive Kin on social media and earn Kin in the Kinny app.

logo.title: C6tjddbbcqkr2t Heoqu O Mp7zlq9aztrhkhp9hyh0ei47gsp K9t1mrbdtf8uyda=s360 Rw

apps.name: Matchmaker
apps.title: Test your matchmaking skills
apps.description: Test your matchmaking skills by deciding whether two people will be a good couple or not. If you're right, you win. If you're wrong, you lose.

apps.name: Nearby
apps.title: Meet new people nearby
apps.description: Nearby is a social network that helps you meet new people near you.

apps.name: Reveald
apps.title: Meet someone new
apps.description: Reveald is a new free dating app where you have to flip through local singles before their pictures are fully revealed!

apps.name: Rave
apps.title: Netflix & YouTube with friends
apps.description: Everything is more fun with friends. Whether it's the latest Netflix show, or the hottest music video on YouTube, sync up with Rave and never watch alone again.

apps.name: Vent
apps.title: Express yourself freely
apps.description:
Vent is like a social diary, a place for you to express how you REALLY feel. 

        Vent helps you connect to a fun, uplifting, positive, and understanding community, making it easy to share your feelings with people around the world and lift your mood!

apps.name: Swelly
apps.title: Swelly provides a platform for Gen Z and millennials to crowdsource opinions for their daily decision making.
apps.description: Swelly keeps their survey/feedback exchange as simple as possible with a standardized image based ‘this or that’ format, which is called a ‘Swell’. Both brands and users can create Swells and post them publicly, or to specific targets, in order to crowdsource opinions. With Kin, users can crowdsource quicker by featuring their Swells with a Kin reward that's given to users who engage with the Swell. User can also gift others for high quality swells and can use their Kin to purchase a 5 euro coupon for a leading retail brand.

apps.name: Tapatalk
apps.title: Tapatalk is the "mobile home" to over 200,000 online forums worldwide.
apps.description: Taptalk allows forum owners and members across the world to engage with multiple forums simultaneously through one dedicated platform. Tapatalk empower their onboarding process by using Kin as a reward for users first steps within the app - essentially guiding them towards forums and communities that they'd love.

apps.name: Kik
apps.title: Kik is an industry leading chat platform built especially for teens and a clear leader in chatbot experiences.
apps.description: Kik is the best way to connect with friends. It's a chat platform built especially for teens and as a clear leader in chatbots, Kik is a central hub for everyday life for teens across the world.

apps.name: Find
apps.title: Find
apps.description: Find is a diverse community of open-minded people looking to discover new friends.

apps.name: imgvue
apps.title: imgvue
apps.description: imgvue is a content-sharing service that rewards creators for their creativity and passion.

apps.name: Just Joking
apps.title: Just Joking
apps.description: Joke sharing app

apps.name: Trymoi
apps.title: Trymoi
apps.description: Dare social media app for daring friends.

apps.name: Kard
apps.title: Kard
apps.description: Send virtual cards and Kin to friends and family.

apps.name: Beseech
apps.title: Beseech
apps.description: Beseech is location based forum to post bounties and ask for favors from your community. You can earn Kin by helping other users solve their problems, and by participating in peer-to-peer & sponsored competitions.

apps.name: Find - Find travelers
apps.title: Social network and messaging platform for travelers.
apps.description: Find is a diverse community of open-minded travelers looking to discover new friends. Find allows you to search for travelers with similar interests passing through your hometown, or in your destination city. With Find, you can make friends in your next stop before you even get there!

apps.name: City Routes
apps.title: City Routes
apps.description: An application for sharing tours of cities with other people.

apps.name: Castle Rush AR
apps.title: Castle Rush AR is an augmented reality collectible card game.
apps.description: Castle Rush AR is an augmented reality collectible card game. How to earn Kin: Destroy your opponent's castle to win the game and get rewarded in cards and Kin. How to spend Kin: Purchase additional cards to play with.

apps.name: RPS for Messenger
apps.title: Rock Paper Scissors with your friends
apps.description: Play Rock Paper Scissors with your friends over the Facebook Messenger!

apps.name: Trivia Clan
apps.title: Daily single-elimination trivia competition
apps.description: Trivia Clan is a daily single-elimination trivia competition where users compete for a grand prize of Kin.

apps.name: Pop.in
apps.title: Pop.in
apps.description: Video app that lets users compete with others on live video

apps.name: Planets Nu
apps.title: Planets Nu
apps.description: A space strategy game where KIN incentivizes players to keep playing.

apps.name: Speed Genius
apps.title: Speed Genius
apps.description: Speed Trivia game where KIN incentivizes being correct quickly.

apps.name: PeerBet
apps.title: PeerBet
apps.description: Free social betting app that lets you place bets in KIN against your friends and other players.

apps.name: Bettapoint
apps.title: Bettapoint
apps.description: Bettapoint is a community-based sports prediction and gaming platform where players compete and earn money based on their playing and prediction skills. KIN will be Bettapoint’s crypto alternative prediction & reward currency.

apps.name: Tiny Ted
apps.title: Tiny Ted
apps.description: In Tiny Ted the player controls a jetpack character and tries to fly between orange pipes without hitting them. Earn KIN by eating Kin coins during flight and then spend your KIN on consumables, power-ups and different characters.

apps.name: Subway Scooter Surf
apps.title: Subway Scooter Surf
apps.description: Carlyle the Cat is back for the holidays and this time he is more crazy than ever! He has stolen the candy to take back to his horde. Your mission is to dodge the subway obstacles and jump, roll, duck, dive, shoot and fly your way to a new all-time high score! Earn Kin by finding Gold Keys and spend Kin to extend your game.

apps.name: Perfect365
apps.title: Try before you buy AR app for makeup
apps.description: Perfect365 allows users to try on different looks that are created by makeup artists and brands using special AR filters. When users find something they like they could explore the different makeup products that make up that look, be directed to the different shops etc. Users could gift makeup artists for beauitfully created looks, and download these looks in low and high resolution with Kin.

apps.name: Uwe
apps.title: Uwe
apps.description: Uwe is a clothing builder app for bespoke fashion. KIN will incentivize designing new clothes every day. The current version is just the beginning and will soon be an entire marketplace.

apps.name: Simple Transfer
apps.title: Simple Transfer
apps.description: SimpleTransfer is a payment app that allows users to send and request Kin from friends and family.

apps.name: Kimeo
apps.title: Video App where everyone gets rewarded
apps.description: We are creating a video app using blockchain, Cloud and cryptocurrencies where people get rewarded for adding content, consuming content and advertisers reward people to watch their content. Everyone is a stakeholder and everyone gets rewarded unlike current platforms where the platform makes major chunk of the revenue.

apps.name: Tippic
apps.title: Discover a new photo every day.
apps.description:
Tippic is a new way to discover amazing photos and reward the people who create them!

        With Tippic, you get to enjoy carefully curated beautiful photos from amateur photographers around the world. But, that’s not all. Instead of just giving them another heart or thumbs up, you get the chance to actually reward them for their work, using Kin, a new digital currency created to give everyone the chance to get rewarded for the value they create online.

apps.name: Kinetik
apps.title: Motivate yourself and others to live a healthier lifestyle with challenges
apps.description:
- Meet challenges and earn KIN cryptocurrency.
        - Connect with like-minded friends.
        - Encourage & challenge each other.

apps.name: KinFit
apps.title: KinFit
apps.description: Pedometer based app that rewards users with KIN for walking, and becoming and staying active.

apps.name: Step And Spend
apps.title: Step And Spend
apps.description: Improve your health and earn KIN every step of the way. KIN will help incentivize walking, health and fitness. End users will earn KIN primarily through walking and be tipped with KIN by other users for achieving walking goals.

apps.name: King VPN
apps.title: Secure and fast way to connect the world from wherever you are
apps.description: King VPN is the most secure and fastest way to connect the world from wherever you are. It is the best proxy VPN client for WiFI security, anonymity, privacy protection and to access sites. The app offers free VPN and you can earn more bandwidth as you complete in app promotions.

apps.name: Photo Mail Joy
apps.title: Order photo prints from your phone
apps.description: Print Pictures from Google, Facebook, Instagram, Dropbox, Picasa & More. Your Photos - Delivered to Your Home - Direct from your Phone. Now with Kin Blockchain Token Support!

apps.name: Wicrypt
apps.title: Wi-Fi sharing mobile application
apps.description: Wicrypt is a peer-to-peer Wi-Fi sharing app that enables users to get rewarded for sharing their mobile data.

apps.name: Kiddobank
apps.title: Kiddobank
apps.description: Cryptocurrency-enabled piggy bank

apps.name: RentMole
apps.title: RentMole
apps.description: Rentmole is a review app for rental experiences. Users are incentivized with KIN to create and review rental experiences and can then spend KIN to access other rental property report details.

apps.name: FistBump.io
apps.title: FistBump.io
apps.description: Your Reputation Based Sharing Economy

apps.name: AgentsCove
apps.title: AgentsCove
apps.description: Network for property agents and consumers.

apps.name: Kinguist
apps.title: Community-driven ecosystem of learning
apps.description: Kinguist is a community-driven ecosystem of learning packs and challenges - teach yourself a new language while helping others learn your native tongue.

apps.name: Syngli
apps.title: AI-based education platform that empowers teachers and learning alike
apps.description: Syngli is an educational tool that harnesses both findings about human learning from cognitive neuroscience, and the power of the web to enable collaborative knowledge generation.

apps.name: Sxlve
apps.title: Sxlve
apps.description: Incentivized homework solution app where KIN facilitates the exchange of homework solutions between askers and experts with KIN.

apps.name: Subti
apps.title: Subti
apps.description: A new and easy way to learn a language using film. Earn KIN by learning a certain amount of new words per day, using the app daily, watching ads and inviting new users. Use KIN to buy subtitles for new films/series.

apps.name: MadLipz
apps.title: MadLipz is a social platform that allows users to create humorous sub and dub videos based on pop culture videos
apps.description: MadLipz is a social platform that allows users to create humorous sub and dub videos based on pop culture videos. MadLipz uses Kin to empower their onboarding process by rewarding their users for their first actions within the app. Users could also gift users for creating high quality content, and earn Kin through the Kin marketplace.

apps.name: Kinit
apps.title: Fun way to earn Kin.
apps.description: Kinit is a fun, easy way to earn Kin, a new cryptocurency made for your digital life. Earning Kin is just like playing a game, only better, because you get rewarded for completing fun daily activities like surveys, quizzes and more.
